metrics_conclusion: Credits (Intro Mix) - Hotel Mario has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Melodic Complexity and Chord-Melody Tension.
key_conclusion: Credits (Intro Mix) - Hotel Mario has sections analyzed in the following keys: F Major, B♭ Major,  and E♭ Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
